familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $5,001 - $15,000 in Rent or Royalties income from KAY & ARR REALTY ASSOCIATES (Residential Real Estate in Elizabeth, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
